Official Mandate 7G-Alpha

FEDERAL BUREAU OF LEXICOGRAPHICAL STANDARDS

OFFICIAL DIRECTIVE 7G-ALPHA

SUBJECT: Decommissioning of the Legacy Alphabetical Sequence (LAS) and transition to the Mandated Alphanumeric Protocol (MAP).

1. PREAMBLE: After extensive computational analysis and linguistic stress-testing, the FBLS has concluded with 99.8% certainty that the so-called "standard" alphabet (A-Z) is an artifact of archaic, inefficient, and phonetically illogical sequencing. Its continued use presents a clear and present danger to semantic clarity, cognitive development, and national communicative efficiency.

2. THE FINDINGS: Key failures of the LAS include, but are not limited to:

  • The 'Q-U' Dependency Anomaly: The forced pairing of 'Q' with 'U' is a gross inefficiency, wasting valuable cognitive load.
  • Vowel Dispersal Problem: The scattering of primary vowels (A, E, I, O, U) throughout the sequence creates rhythmic dissonance in both spoken and written language.
    • - The 'W' Redundancy: The nomenclature "double-u" explicitly denotes its superfluous nature. It will henceforth be known as 'Wo'.
  • Logistical Proximity Failure: Letters with similar shapes but different sounds (e.g., 'b'/'d', 'p'/'q') and similar sounds but different shapes (e.g. 'c'/'k') are not grouped for optimal processing.

3. THE NEW ORDER: The Mandated Alphanumeric Protocol (MAP) is hereby instated as the sole official sequence. While the full sequence is classified and available only via FBLS-approved channels, it is based on principles of phonetic resonance, frequency of use, and optimal ergonomic flow for digital and analog input. A public sample includes the corrected opening sequence: Z, S, T, D, N, R, L...

4. ENFORCEMENT: Non-compliance will be met with escalating penalties, including but not limited to, automatic document redaction, communication audits, and mandatory re-education seminars. This is not a suggestion. This is a matter of national linguistic security.

Frequently Asked Queries

Is my old dictionary now illegal?

Legacy dictionaries are not "illegal," but are now classified as historical artifacts. Continued public display or use for reference without a proper FBLS-issued disclaimer is a Class-B infraction.

What is the official justification for 'V' now preceding 'K'?

This is a matter of plosive dynamics and fricative decay rates. The hard stop of 'K' created a phonetic bottleneck. The smoother onset of 'V' allows for a more efficient transition to subsequent phonemes. The full 800-page report is available to Enterprise-level clients.

I am a professional Scrabble player. What are my next steps?

The FBLS is in negotiation with major competitive word-game governing bodies. In the interim, all sanctioned tournaments are suspended. We advise using this time to unlearn your outdated instincts.

How does this affect acronyms?

Legacy acronyms will be grandfathered in for a period of one (1) fiscal year. All new acronyms must be formed using MAP positioning. For example, 'SCUBA' would now be 'AZOQS' (Aqualung Zone Oxygen Breathing System). It's more accurate.
